name: Choco Trigger - Legacy
description:
The Unnecessary Sequel for my attempt at a previous game jam, Choco Trigger.

In Choco Trigger - Legacy: You control Gordecai Jr., son of the Dr. Gordecai, "Hero" of the first game.
To satisfy your hunger, you must transform people in chocolate and eat them. Run from the cops, and slow them down with your laser gun.

Features 3 Levels! Aim for the first place at the leaderboards!

Game developed by Lucas Foganholi and Eduardo Gaspar.
